   By opening a Bamboo account, you have also opened an account with our US broker partner, DriveWeath LLC. DriveWealth is licensed by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission and is also a member of the Financial Industry Regulatory Authority (FINRA) and the U.S. Securities Investor Protection Corporation (SIPC).

   The SIPC insures your Bamboo account up to $500,000. All your wallet balances on Bamboo are insured up to $250,000 by the U.S. Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC).
